Package it.polimi.ingsw.View.GUI.SceneController.Utility

Class ItemRefillUtility

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.View.GUI.SceneController.Utility.ItemRefillUtility
public class ItemRefillUtility extends Object
The ItemRefillUtility class provides utility methods for managing item tiles in the GUI.

    • updateBoardGrid

      public static void updateBoardGrid(ItemTile[][] reference)
      updates the board view with the item tiles given with the reference
      Parameters:
      reference - the way the grid must appear after the update

    • updateShelfGrid

      public static void updateShelfGrid(ItemTile[][] reference)
      since the shelf is a write-only type of object this method uses this property to optimize the update. It checks each column starting from above, and it stops inserting if the tile is already shown in the shelf.
      Parameters:
      reference - the correct shelf to show

    • updateOtherShelfGrid

      public static void updateOtherShelfGrid(javafx.scene.layout.GridPane shelf, ItemTile[][] reference)
      Updates the shelf of a player that is not the one currently connected to the Client with the item tiles given by the reference.
      Parameters:
      shelf - the GridPane representing the other player's shelf
      reference - the item tile reference for the other player's shelf
